text:
Depesh joined the @PRCLeicester #COVID19 #vaccine trial. “When the opportunity to be part of a novel study and make a difference to the crazy world we are currently living in, I couldn’t refuse to be part of the trial.” 
Find out more: https://t.co/1q6W2jk0hK
